title: travelplanner: Could you help develop a week-long travel itinerary suitable for a group of 6 people, departing from Baton Rouge and planning to visit 3 different cities in Texas? The travel dates are set from March 17th to March 23rd, 2022. Our travel budget has been adjusted to $14,600. Bearing in mind that we have children under ten years old, our accommodations need to allow young children and we prefer to occupy entire rooms. We also prefer not to self-drive during this trip. (9f5340da2cbfb1e9)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content:
## Itinerary for a Texas Adventure: March 17-23, 2022

### Day 1: Baton Rouge to Austin

Unfortunately, I could not find any flights from Baton Rouge to Austin on March 17, 2022. You may want to consider adjusting your travel dates or explore other transport options to begin your journey.

### Days 2-4: Austin

**Accommodation:**
- Entire 2-bedroom top floor in Clinton Hill - $317 per night
- Beautiful 3-bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - $1169 per night
- Spacious Williamsburg 1-bedroom - $455 per night
- Gorgeous Zen Home at Crossroads of Nolita and Soho - $1148 per night

**Attractions:**
- Texas Capitol
- Zilker Metropolitan Park
- Museum of the Weird
- Bullock Texas State History Museum
- Austin Zoo
- Austin Nature & Science Center

**Dining:**
- Wildflour Cafe + Bakery for desserts, French, and seafood
- Chili's for a casual American and seafood meal
- The Kasbah for pizza and BBQ
- Talaga Sampireun for fast food, cafe, and bakery fare

### Day 5: Austin to Houston

**Flight options from Austin to Houston on March 20:**
- Flight number F3838772 departing at 12:09, arriving at 13:05 - $40
- Flight number F3897966 departing at 05:27, arriving at 06:12 - $53
- Flight number F3898377 departing at 07:41, arriving at 08:36 - $54
- Flight number F3899169 departing at 17:40, arriving at 18:52 - $39
- Flight number F3899456 departing at 14:12, arriving at 15:04 - $68
- Flight number F3951737 departing at 18:43, arriving at 20:03 - $39
- Flight number F3951738 departing at 13:52, arriving at 14:41 - $69
- Flight number F3951739 departing at 21:04, arriving at 21:48 - $47
- Flight number F3951740 departing at 06:39, arriving at 07:26 - $53
- Flight number F3951741 departing at 10:55, arriving at 11:41 - $65
- Flight number F4039783 departing at 09:44, arriving at 10:37 - $46
- Flight number F4040256 departing at 16:26, arriving at 17:24 - $55

### Days 6-7: Houston

**Attractions:**
- Cathedral of Junk
- McKinney Falls State Park
- Umlauf Sculpture Garden & Museum
- Haunted ATX
- Blanton Museum of Art
- Mexic-Arte Museum
- Pease Park Treehouse

### Day 8: Houston to San Antonio

**Flight options from Houston to San Antonio on March 22:**
- Flight number F3894654 departing at 13:34, arriving at 14:41 - $39
- Flight number F3895147 departing at 16:22, arriving at 17:46 - $78
- Flight number F3895164 departing at 20:45, arriving at 21:46 - $87
- Flight number F3895205 departing at 14:37, arriving at 15:37 - $65
- Flight number F3982738 departing at 15:55, arriving at 16:53 - $53
- Flight number F3982739 departing at 20:36, arriving at 21:29 - $40
- Flight number F3982740 departing at 00:20, arriving at 01:07 - $88
- Flight number F3982741 departing at 13:04, arriving at 13:52 - $56
- Flight number F4040027 departing at 11:21, arriving at 12:21 - $44
- Flight number F4040530 departing at 18:33, arriving at 19:33 - $93

### Day 9: San Antonio

**Attractions:**
- Austin Aquarium
- Statesman Bat Observation Center
- Mayfield Park and Nature Preserve
- Texas Selfie Museum
- Austin Visitor Center

---

This itinerary provides a mix of attractions, accommodation options, and dining experiences in three different cities in Texas, suitable for a group of 6 including children under ten. It is advisable to book accommodation and flights promptly to secure your preferred choices. Enjoy your Texas adventure!

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
